summary: There is great excitement in Aidar's home one fine day when he comes back from Paris to his mountain village with a charming French girl called Isabelle. Aidar has changed but everything at... See full summary »
cast: Natacha Régnier|Bolot Tentimyshov|Tynar Abdrazaeva|Melis Sharshenbaev|Asan Amanov|Marat Zhanteliev|Absamat Uulu Nurseit|Marat Kozukeev|Zhenishbek Smanov|Nazira Orozalieva|Evgeniya Dobrovolskaya|Ayzhan Akylbekova|Ainura Turgunbaeva|Aidai Saitova|Kyzy Kunduz Nurbek|Kyzy Nurgyz Nurbek|Kamchybek Sarybaiev|Gulyzhat Tursunbaeva|Chinghiz Eraliev|Mukanbet Toktobaev|Meerim Shermatova
title: Sunduk predkov
